text: Mehmet Xheka is a member of the Assembly of the Republic of Albania for the Democratic Party of Albania.He is a well known doctor and member of World Health Organization.He was the first and the only Deputy of the Democratic Party of the city of Berat who won the elections against the Socialist Party and Socialist Movement for Integration. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Democratic Party of Albania politicians Category:Members of the Parliament of Albania Category:21st-century Albanian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mehmet Xheka
